contact_points.usage: Grasp the key here for insertion and rotation.

functional_points.description: Key tip (bit) and its insertion axis
functional_points.usage: Functional point for insertion into keyhole. First approach/insert along insertion axis, then rotate to unlock/lock.

frame_hint.approach_note: If task says insert/put into keyhole: translate along -y FUNCTIONAL (V=[0,-1,0,0,0,0]).
frame_hint.action_note: If task says unlock/lock: rotate around +y/-y FUNCTIONAL.
frame_hint.disambiguation: Split into two steps if needed: (1) insert v, (2) rotate Ï‰.
